entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Guelph Turfgrass Institute 6:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -4.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -7.9°C
Wind: NNW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
